dict.acceptation: 仓促（做某事）；催促；（朝某方向）迅速移动；迅速处理；

sent.orig: This was an inferno of pain and smell and noise and hurry--hurry--hurry!
sent.trans: 这是一个充满了痛苦、臭味、喧嚣和忙乱的地狱--忙乱，多么忙乱啊！

sent.orig: Shocked, Mr. Cao could think of nothing to say but, "Hurry, hurry."
sent.trans: 曹先生害了怕，想不起说什么好，“你快，快——”

sent.orig: Many compassion public figures come in a hurry, goes in a hurry.
sent.trans: 许多爱心人士匆匆而来，匆匆而去。

sent.orig: "I wish they'd hurry," Mrs. Dunbar said to her older son. "I wish they'd hurry. "
sent.trans: “我希望他们能快点，”邓巴太太对她的大儿子说。“我希望他们能快点。”
